page.title: 03THE FARMING YEAR MILK
page.content: My name is Joanne Scott.I live on a dairy farm. Dad starts work at 6.30am. He gets the cows in from the field into the collection yard.He starts milking the cows.We have 128 cows to milk.We have Automatic Cluster Removers.When the cows have finished they come off by themselves.After the cows have been milked they go down a passage into the cubicle shed where they can have something to eat or lie down. In the evening the same thing happens again. The tanker comes and takes the milk to a dairy in the morning. At the dairy it is cleaned,put into bottles and then delivered to the milkman who delivers it to our doors.
